Nord Piano 6

The latest generation of the Nord Piano series features a new panel design with LED faders, dual layers for Piano and Synth with independent effects and a premium Triple Sensor keybed. Combined with excellent portability and our world-class sounds, the Nord Piano 6 offers great flexibility for performance and sound creation.

Models

Nord Piano 6 88
Nord Piano 6 73

88-key Triple Sensor Hammer Action Keybed

Overview
Specifications
Sounds
Downloads
Images & videos
Accessories
Highlight features

General

2 Piano + 2 Sample Synth Layers for advanced splits and layering
Dedicated LED faders for each Layer
Premium Triple sensor keybed
Nord Triple Pedal 2 included

Effects

Dedicated Effects section per Layer
Modulation Effects with Rate and Amount
Global Reverb with Send per Layer, Pre-Delay, Chorale and Bright/Dark mode
New Spring reverb
New Spin effect
Delay with new Filter, Flam and Ping Pong options
Dedicated Compressor effect

Piano Section

2 independent Piano Layers
120 Voice Polyphony
Soft, Mid, Bright and Dyno filters
Dynamic Compression
Unison feature
3 Keyboard Touch options
Advanced String Resonance

Sample Synth

2 independent Sample Synth Layers
Unison for rich, ensemble-like sounds
Tru-Vibrato with real time control
Round robin for natural sounding repetitions
Mono and Legato modes with Glide
Attack, Decay/Sustain, Release and Dynamic controls

Performance

The Nord Piano 6 has a new panel design with dedicated LED faders for Piano and Synth sections as well as knobs and buttons for all essential features, offering great flexibility when performing and designing sounds. The dual Piano and Synth engines can be layered together or split across the keyboard, with each layer featuring its own dedicated Effects section.

Dual Piano Layers
Dual Synth Layers
Split Point with 9 locations and optional Crossfade
Seamless Transitions
6 Live programs
Program Up/Down and Vibrato options for Nord Triple Pedal 2

Piano Section

The Nord Piano 6 contains a large selection of Grands, Uprights and Electric Pianos from our exclusive Nord Piano Library along with new features such as Dynamic Compression and Unison. Our state-of-the-art sampling technique captures the extraordinary nuances and real character of the source instruments.

The new included Nord Triple Pedal 2 enables our unique ‘Advanced String Resonance’ and Dynamic Pedal Noise features, delivering stunning realism and expressiveness.

Extensive collection of Grands, Uprights, EPs and more
Dynamic Compression
Unison feature
Creative Timbre options
Advanced String Resonance
Dynamic Pedal Noise

Sample Synth Section

The Sample Synth features two independent layers and comes with a broad collection of new and updated sounds, ranging from strings, wind, brass, basses and guitars to classic analog leads and basses. The factory bank includes exclusive high-end samples from the acclaimed Spitfire, Symphobia and Swing libraries. The Sample Synth section provides two fully-featured and independent Layers equipped with intuitive controls for attack, decay/sustain, release and dynamic velocity response.

Additional Sample Synth features include Unison, which blends multiple sample voices for rich, ensemble-like sounds and “Tru-Vibrato”, capturing the unique vibrato characteristics of various acoustic instruments. The advanced Round-Robin feature allows for a natural sound when repeating notes.

2 independent Synth Layers
Enhanced samples with Tru-Vibrato, Unison and Round Robin

Effect Section

The Nord Piano 6 has an expanded new Effects section per Layer. The wide range of Effects includes brand new types of Reverb, Delay, Amps and Modulation effects.

Dedicated Effects section per Layer
Modulation Effects with Rate and Amount
Global Reverb with Send per Layer, Pre-Delay, Chorale and Bright/Dark mode
New Spring reverb
New Spin effect
Delay with new Filter, Flam and Ping-Pong
Dedicated Compressor effect
Amp with new Tone variations
